slide.title: Relative Time
slide.subtitle: "first day *of* next month"
slide.example:
<?php
  $date = new DateTime( '2010-01-31 15:48:21' );
  echo $date->modify( 'first day of next month' )->format( 'Y-m-d' ), "\n";
?>
